Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.pages

Class PageData

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.pages.PageData
public class PageData
extends java.lang.Object
The PageData class is a singleton class that encapsulates page configuration data into a usable java class. It contains getter methods for page urls, and account data based on the given environment or account data based on the given environment and the account map within that environment.

    • loadYaml

      public static PageData loadYaml​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Returns PageData for the given fileName as a string.
      Parameters:
      fileName - String the name of the page configuration file
      Returns:
      PageData the configured PageData
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the configuration file cannot be opened or read
      See Also:
      loadYaml(File)

    • loadYaml

      public static PageData loadYaml​(java.io.File fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Returns the usable PageData object from the given File object.
      Parameters:
      fileName - File the File object to which the configurations will be mapped.
      Returns:
      PageData the configured PageData
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the configuration file cannot be opened or read

    • getAccount

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getAccount​(java.lang.String env, java.lang.String account)
      Returns account data for the given environment and the given account, e.g. If an environment has more than one account, Sentinel can run tests for any number of those accounts.
      Parameters:
      env - String the desired environment (qa, sit, etc.)
      account - String the requested account
      Returns:
      Map<String, String> the user account data, or null if the requested environment doesn't exist

    • getElement

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getElement​(java.lang.String elementName)
      Returns an element if it exists in a page object.
      Parameters:
      elementName - the name of the element in the page object under the 'elements' section
      Returns:
      Map<String, String> the locators for an element

    • getPageParts

      public java.lang.String[] getPageParts()
      Returns any page parts to search for elements
      Returns:
      String[] list of page parts
